ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 238
ygData.msgSnippet: ... ) and I had no problems combining. I also had no problems combining the Jeweled Skull back when I did. I am fairly certain that for quests, it will always
ygData.messageBody:
>>>> Well, I got my staff yesterday (at level 29, maybe the youngest ever :)
) and I had no problems combining. I also had no problems combining the
Jeweled Skull back when I did. I am fairly certain that for quests, it
will always work. Have you ever heard of someone failing to combine a
quest item?<<<<<


Combining the rods used to be dependent on your research skill but I believe
this was changed because of the amount of complaints. I know many, many
people who continue to do the quest for the experience and they never fail
to combine them anymore.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
